CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(First_Entered_Shopping_Date__c)), "1. Advanced", IF( ISBLANK(Advancement_Forecast_Date__c), "5. Not in Forecast", CASE(Advancement_Confidence__c, "Commit","2. In Forecast - Commit", "Best Case","3. In Forecast - Best Case", "4. In Forecast" ) ) )
CustomField.label: Wave: Advancement Category
